 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבַץ‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** probably ==weave in chequer or plaited work== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבַץ‎</span> ***ornament a vessel with a pattern***; Syriac (Lexicons) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***immiscuit***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***commixtio:*** see also [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 143</sup>); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשִׁבַּצְתָּ֫‎</span> [[Exod.28.39|Exod 28:39]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), ***and thou shalt chequer (or plait)*** the tunic (in) byssus. **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֻׁבָּצִים זָהָב‎</span> [[Exod.28.20|Exod 28:20]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), ***inwoven*** (i.e. set in a chequered or plaited mounting) ***with gold*** (-thread) shall they be (of gems).
